      @GET @Path("/name/{name}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getChatbotByName(@PathParam("name") String name)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getResponseForChatbot

      private jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getResponseForChatbot(Chatbot chatbot)
      Helper method to get the response for a chatbot.
      Parameters:
      chatbot - the chatbot to get the response for ir 500 if something went wrong while processing the chatbot to json or 404 if the chatbot could not be found
      Returns:
      the response
